question: Which of the following kings succeeded the Chola king Kollutung I?
explanation: Vikrama Chola was a Chola ruler who ruled in 12th-century from 1118 A.D. to 1135 A.D. He was the son and the successor of king Kulothunga I. Vikrama Chola was a great devotee of Siva and greatly patronized the temple at Chidambaram
